 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּר‎</span>] **verb** ==change== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Hiph\`il; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (medial <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ו‎</span>) is ***move to and fro*** (intransitive); <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (medial <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) ***procure*** food, Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***buy*** or ***import*** food, Nö<sup>ZMG xi. 1886, 154</sup>); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָמָ֑ר‎</span> (as if from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרר‎</span>) ***be changed***, [[Jer.48.11|Jer 48:11]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵיחוֺ‎</span> (of wine, figurative of Moab); **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵמִיר‎</span> [[Jer.2.11|Jer 2:11]] on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַהֵימִיר‎</span> ***ib.***, see K?:i. 457; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמִיר‎</span> [[Ps.15.4|Ps 15:4]] + 3 t.; jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמֵר‎</span> [[Ezek.48.14|Ezek 48:14]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְמִירֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Lev.27.33|Lev 27:33]] (twice in verse); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָמִיר‎</span> [[Hos.4.7|Hos 4:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּמִ֫ירוּ‎</span> [[Ps.106.20|Ps 106:20]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָמִיר‎</span> [[Ps.46.3|Ps 46:3]] absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָמֵר‎</span> [[Lev.27.10|Lev 27:10]]; [[Lev.27.33|Lev 27:33]] — 

**1.** ***change, alter***, [[Mic.2.4|Mic 2:4]] (object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵלֶק עַמִּי‎</span>; but [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמַּד בַּחֶבֶל‎</span>, so [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>ZAW 1886, 122 f.</sup>); [[Ps.15.4|Ps 15:4]] (no object expressed); Hiph\`il declar. [[Ps.46.3|Ps 46:3]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארץ‎</span> subject, [[BDB#Hup|Hup]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and others, [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:115»§ 115</sup>, 2, R. 2) ***when the earth shews change***; [[BDB#Krochm|Krochm]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] proposes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִמּוֺג‎</span> (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוג‎</span> v[[Ps.46.7|Ps 46:7]]b \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוט‎</span>), but needless. 

**2.** ***exchange*** (followed by accusative of object relinquished, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> before object acquired) [[Lev.27.10|Lev 27:10]] (4 t. in verse) (2 t. as Infinitive absolute); [[Hos.4.7|Hos 4:7]]; [[Ps.106.20|Ps 106:20]] compare with one object [[Lev.27.33|Lev 27:33]] (3 t. in verse) (once as Infinitive absolute); [[Jer.21.11|Jer 21:11]] (twice in verse) (compare above); without object [[Ezek.48.14|Ezek 48:14]] (but [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוּמַר‎</span>, Hoph\`al). **Hoph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוּמַר‎</span> [[Ezek.48.14|Ezek 48:14]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Co|Co]], compare [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]].
